title: Army veteran behind Montenegro U.S. embassy attack
text:
Army veteran behind Montenegro U.S. embassy attack 7:28am GMT - 01:07 
A Yugoslav army veteran who manned anti-aircraft defenses during the NATO bombing in 1999 tossed a hand grenade into the U.S. embassy compound in Podgorica, capital of Montenegro, around midnight and then blew himself up.   
A Yugoslav army veteran who manned anti-aircraft defenses during the NATO bombing in 1999 tossed a hand grenade into the U.S. embassy compound in Podgorica, capital of Montenegro, around midnight and then blew himself up.  //reut.rs/2EWHt45
